content: We are noticing for last 1 hour that the green light for the user live status is conspicuously missing for all users of zulip on our self hosted deployment. We haven't done any recent upgrade (Nov 18 , 2022 being last). Anyone else seen this before? What is the resolution.
This topic was moved here from #user community > user live status missing by Alya Abbott.
@Pankaj Lal: Does supervisorctl status show everything as running?
Also, is that with all users using the web app, or eg. desktop, mobile, terminal, etc.?
